articles.description: After blowing a two-goal lead to draw against the Premier League's bottom club Wolves, there will be no dodging the questions on whether Arsenal are mentally ready to end their 22-year wait to become champions.
articles.title: Arsenal title race: 'Bottle word will be used' for Gunners after Wolves draw

articles.description: Newcastle's Anthony Gordon only had one thought in his mind as his side faced Qarabag in the Champions League...
articles.title: Anthony Gordon: Newcastle forward breaks Alan Shearer's record

articles.description: Team GB's Winter Olympics curling medal hopes in both the men's and women's events are somehow still alive after a day of epic drama in Cortina.
articles.title: Winter Olympics 2026: GB win three must-win matches to revive medal hopes

articles.description: The Seattle Seahawks are officially put up for sale - 10 days after winning American football's biggest prize.
articles.title: NFL: Seattle Seahawks put up for sale - 10 days after Super Bowl win

articles.description: Spanish football expert Guillem Balague details how Vincius Jr has become a global symbol of resistance against discrimination.
articles.title: Vinicius Jr: Eight years at Real Madrid, 20 cases of alleged racist abuse

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Arsenal vs OH Leuven in the UEFA Women's Champions League
articles.title: Arsenal vs OH Leuven: UEFA Women's Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: American star Mikaela Shiffrin cemented her status as the greatest alpine skier of all time as she won Olympic slalom gold in emphatic fashion.
articles.title: Mikaela Shiffrin breezes to Winter Olympic slalom gold in emphatic fashion

articles.description: Bodo/Glimt's fairytale continues as they added Inter Milan to their list of prized scalps to put them within touching distance of a place in the Champions League last 16.
articles.title: Bodo/Glimt 3-1 Inter Milan: Bodo in touching distance of Champions League last 16

articles.description: Multiple Olympic champion Simone Biles says she offered support to American figure skater Ilia Malinin after her compatriot's shock collapse at Milan-Cortina 2026.
articles.title: 2026 Winter Olympics: Ilia Malinin meets Simone Biles after figure skating heartbreak

articles.description: Club Brugge score a dramatic late equaliser as they twice fight back against Atletico Madrid to leave their Champions League knockout phase play-off tie delicately poised.
articles.title: Club Brugge 3-3 Atletico Madrid: Hosts fight back to leave Champions League tie delicately poised
